message.content:
1. The family-centered empowerment model can be applied among methamphetamine users and their families.
2. The application of this model is practically feasible.
3. The application of the family-centered empowerment model can enhance the quality of life (QoL) of methamphetamine users and their families.
4. The application of the family-centered empowerment model can improve the lifestyle of methamphetamine users and their families.
5. The application of the family-centered empowerment model can enhance health promotion model constructs for methamphetamine users and their families.

messages.content:
Statement: Application of family-centered empowerment model among methamphetamine users and their families is practically feasible and can result in enhancement and improvement of their QoL, lifestyle, and health promotion model constructs.

List all the facts we explicitly know from the statement. Make each fact as atomic as possible.
